string.text:
A sledgehammer is a tool with a large, flat, often metal head, attached to a long handle. The long handle combined with a heavy head allows the sledgehammer to gather momentum during a swing and apply a large amount of force.
 
 [0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] melee weapon
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] greater reach compared to knives
